No...The people spoke for Hillary by nearly 3 million votes.. the EC gave him the election.

It makes no difference what religion he is. He is a incredible person whom everyone should be proud to call Brother, and he did an awesome thing for 400 other people that everyone else should be proud to call brother.

For all of you saying that this had nothing to do with race, and that it was work related only... The suspect himself said this was race related- regardless of whether it was in the workplace or not... In his manifesto, he pinpoints that this is all due to racism... that this is what drove him to do what he did... I'm not saying racism doesn't exist and drive people to kill, because look at what happened at the Church in Charleston... but that guy targeted a race as a whole- and (it is being reported) that this guy targeted old co-workers because his Equal Employment Opportunity claim was denied... (it is being reported that) he was fired because of accusations made against him by these two at points back in his career in 2012-2013, and he is sour that they hired her on as an anchor after her internship, and he lost his job... that's why he tweeted all of those tweets... His previous managers even report that he was difficulty to work with, he had anger issues, he was paranoid, and would look for things that people would say that he could twist around to take offense to and then cry racism... This is premeditated murder... Plain and simple... and he took the cowardly way out SMH... Prayers to all of the families who lost loved ones today...

Heather, pastors ALREADY have the right to refuse to preform marriages for ANYONE. Got that? Same with churches; You can not force a church to hold a religious ceremony if they choose not to AND further they can do so without consequence. So your point is....what? And for God's sake, read the FACTS of the friggin' Klein case and the others before you go making yourself look like an even bigger idiot than you've managed to do thus far. Now, unless your reading comprehension skills are non-existent, answer the question; What """"extra"""" rights do LGBT people have over heterosexuals? If you chose not to answer and sidestep it again, you're original premise is null and void because you've had numerous opportunities to explain, but have refused to do so since I called you on it yesterday. Oh, and newsflash, sweetcheeks, According to people like you, if the SCOTUS legalized gay marriage, we were all going to face God's wrath post haste. So either God's taking his sweet time with the wrath distribution or he doesn't give a flying rat's ass about homosexuality like you think he does.
